Alex Cagwin

Alex Cagwin.
NYC based freelance Digital Designer Head of Design at  Baby Noggin UX Lead on Publicis'  Marcel
Case Studies
Octane AI  Chatbot Manager Dumptruck  Logistics Platform Hopsy  Redesign Nvolv  Conferences
Client Work
  • Publicis Groupe.

    Currently leading UX on Marcel with the talented team at SapientRazorfish.

  • Harley Davidson.

    Worked on concepts of Harley Davidson's ride planner throughout 2017. All work is strictly confidential.

  • Fidelity.

    Helped re-design some of Fidsafe, a document collaboration tool for Fidelity clients in winter of 2017.

  • ShearShare.

    Product design and front-end development for ShearShare. A b2b marketplace for salon and barbershop owners. Worked on it throughout 2016 and in 2018.

  • Dumptruck.

    Lead designer on a large-scale, trucking logistics platform. Worked on it in end of 2016 and early 2017. View Case Study.

  • Hopsy.

    Lead the re-design of Hopsy, a marketplace for fresh, local, craft beers in winter of 2017. View Case Study.

  • Octane AI.

    Lead product design for Octane AI, a new way to build chatbots, in the Fall of 2016. Did some of front-end development as well. View Case Study.

  • Everwill.

    In fall of 2016, lead product design for a responsive web app to make the will building process easier than ever.

  • West Agile Labs.

    Former Lead Designer at West Agile Labs, where I helped create and build out the product teams as well as worked on 40+ digital products.

  • Nvolv.

    Branding, product design and prototyping for bespoke events iOS app in spring of 2016. View Case Study.

  • Instapark.

    Lead the re-design and iterative prototypes of an on-demand, car-port-sharing mobile app concept back in winter of 2015. View Case Study.

  • Natera.

    Helped design some internal sales tools and a client facing portal back in Fall of 2015.

Personal Projects
  • The World's Best Breakfast Tacos.

    On a quest to make the best breakfast taco's the world has ever seen. Shoot me an email for a taste test. Check out the tacos.

  • Dodo.

    Product design and prototyping for internal tool to help reduce mobile-bug reporting time. View Case Study.

  • Cal Poly Distance Club.

    Branding, product design and front-end development for my old college cross country team. Launching winter 2016. View The Project.

  • The Underground Symphony.

    Exploring the muscians of New York's sprawling subway system. I worked on the branding and product design. View The Project.

  • Year In Review.

    Personal project. Adventures and photos throughout the years. Take a Peek Into My Life.

  • Cross Country Roadtrip.

    Little personal microsite I put together for a 4 month roadtrip I took. Check it out.
